description:
In this video, we take your flight simulation experience to the next level by creating a special configuration for the TBM-930 using the Turtlebeach VelocityOne Flight System. Building on the profile we created in an earlier video, we‚Äôll show you how to make a small but impactful modification to optimize your setup specifically for the TBM-930. Whether you're a seasoned pilot or new to the flight sim community, this tutorial will help you get the most out of your VelocityOne Flight System. Don't miss out on these pro tips to enhance your flight sim adventures!

If you want to know how to configure your yoke for the VelocityOne FlightSystem have a look at this video: https://youtu.be/pPUmG0kOVCs

If you missed the initial video about how to setup the quadrant you will find the video over here: https://youtu.be/AXdTE-OINDc
